name: Lamar JOHNSON, Petitioner v. UNITED STATES

court.name: Supreme Court of the United States

parties:
Lamar JOHNSON, Petitioner
v.
UNITED STATES
attorneys: On petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Ninth Circuit. Motion of petitioner for leave to proceed in forma pauperis and petition for writ of certiorari granted. Judgment vacated, and case remanded to the United States Court of Appeals for the Ninth Circuit for further consideration in light of Rehaif v. United States , 588 U.S. ----, 139 S.Ct. 2191, 204 L.Ed.2d 594 (2019).
casebody.head_matter:
Lamar JOHNSON, Petitioner
v.
UNITED STATES
No. 19-5181
Supreme Court of the United States.
October 21, 2019
On petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Ninth Circuit. Motion of petitioner for leave to proceed in forma pauperis and petition for writ of certiorari granted. Judgment vacated, and case remanded to the United States Court of Appeals for the Ninth Circuit for further consideration in light of Rehaif v. United States , 588 U.S. ----, 139 S.Ct. 2191, 204 L.Ed.2d 594 (2019).
